game.name: Domineering
game.board: Domineering is often played on an N-row, N-column board. The board is empty at the start of the game.
game.pieces: One player uses vertical dominoes and the other uses horizontal dominoes. The player using vertical dominoes can cover any two vertically adjacent cells of the board with a domino. The player using horizontal dominoes can cover any two horizontally adjacent cells of the board with a domino.
game.rules: Each turn, a player places a single domino onto the board. Each domino placed (1) cannot extend beyond the board's boundaries and (2) cannot overlap or cover a cell that is already occupied by another domino.[br]A player loses if they cannot legally place a domino on their turn.[img src="a.svg" alt="a" width="300" height="300"]
